amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-187 to ensure that states include in their applications how they will use the funds to help individuals who have been displaced or relocated from a public housing authority to an alternative public housing facility or placed on rental assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Bost.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bost amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
